mapper.select: SELECT T2.PD_CD , T2.PD_NM , SUBSTR(T2.SAP_MAT_CD, 10, 9) AS SAP_MAT_CD /* 자재코드 */ , T3.PD_PRP_VAL01 || NVL2(T3.PD_PRP_VAL01,'-','') || T3.PD_PRP_VAL31 AS AS_ITEM_CD /* 품목코드 */ FROM TB_PDBS_PD_REL T1 INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T2 ON T2.PD_CD = T1.BASE_PD_CD AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL T3 ON T3.PD_CD = T2.PD_CD AND T3.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART' /* 'PART' : AS부품 */ AND T3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE T1.PD_REL_TP_CD = '14' /* 14 : AS부품 */ AND T1.OJ_PD_CD = #{partPdCd} AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N'
